mapper.insert: insert into t_quality (id, title, author, publisdate, coment) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{author,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{publisdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{coment,jdbcType=LONGVARBINARY})
mapper.select: select id, title, author, publisdate, coment from t_quality
